title: Dear champions, what are you proud of having?

replies.body:
{{champion:41}} 
I'VE GOT A JAR OF DIRT!
You also proooobably have Swain's warship... but let's forget about that...

{{champion:17}} +{{champion:18}} : (Look at each other and then at someone that Rumble could date.)

{{champion:78}} : What?

As cute as it is, Galio will outlast her. Besides, Rumble + Poppy. Common, its so adorable. 

{{champion:68}} So, uh... cool hammer.
{{champion:78}} Thanks, its for a hero. I just haven't found him yet.
{{champion:68}} Wait, if its for someone else, why do you use it?
{{champion:78}} ... I don't know. Its... its... its-
{{champion:68}} Precious to you?
{{champion:78}} Yeah.
{{champion:68}} I know, I get it. My hunk of junk is precious to me too. One of these days, Brandle City will see me as a hero. Someone... they can look up to.
{{champion:78}} Heh.
{{champion:68}} What? What's funny?
{{champion:78}} Its nothing.
{{champion:68}} What!? My dreams are not something to be laughed at! I'll show you. I'll-
{{champion:78}} It's just, you're looking to be a hero, and I'm looking *for* a hero.
{{champion:68}} Oh...
{{champion:78}} Too bad you're not a hero. Bet you can't even lift the hammer. (smiles)
{{champion:68}} I can to. (struggles to lift hammer) Why... won't it... budge?
{{champion:78}} (giggles)
{{champion:68}} Shut up. I don't need strength.
{{champion:78}} Hey Rumble...
{{champion:68}} Yeah?
{{champion:78}} Do you really think... Do you really think we'll be able to achieve our goals?
{{champion:68}} Yeah. Definitely. There's no way we could-
{{champion:78}} Its just, I've never even seen the guy. He's always one step in head of me.
{{champion:68}} ...
{{champion:78}} What if... what if... he isn't real, Rumble?
{{champion:68}} ... It doesn't matter.
{{champion:78}} What?
{{champion:68}} It doesn't matter if he's real or not. Poppy, you're the true hero.
{{champion:78}} (looks at Rumble in shock)
{{champion:68}} If you can't find the hero... why not be the hero?
{{champion:78}} I can't-
{{champion:68}} You can Poppy. I know it. I've never seen a girl like you before. You remind me of Tristana every time I look at you. You're brave, loyal, strong. You're even honest, trust worthy, and very pretty.
{{champion:78}} ... You really think so?
{{champion:68}} Don't let anyone bring you down. And if someone does... then... then I'll bring the Smack Down on them with Tristy.
{{champion:78}} ... thank you, Rumble.
{{champion:68}} (blushes) Well, yeah... 
{{champion:78}} I have to go now, see you around, Rumble.
{{champion:68}} You too.

-------------------------------------------------------
{{champion:3}} Hey champ, how ya been. I haven't seen you in forever... Hey, you feeling alright?
{{champion:78}} Gal... what do you call it when you're stomach feels weird and you're head feels weird as well?
{{champion:3}} Uh...
{{champion:78}} Why did Rumble say I was pretty?..
{{champion:3}} ... I think I know. *Heh*
{{champion:78}} You do!? What is it? Please, Gal, why do I feel so weird?
{{champion:3}} You like him.
{{champion:78}} ... what?
{{champion:3}} You know. Him. 
{{champion:78}} Who...
{{champion:3}} ... Rumble!
{{champion:78}} What!? Why? How? I don't get it. I like Rumble?
{{champion:3}} (tear runs down cheek) My little Yordle is growing up. I feel like a father.
c'mon everyone knows shes looking for a hero, who can weild the hammer, and deep down in our hearts we know who this outrageous hero is, thats right , the one, the only, {{champion:44}}
Fucking hell what fanfic writer did I stumble upon.
{{champion:25}} An afk warning for those who are binded by her

{{champion:75}} stacks
{{champion:122}} axe
{{champion:157}} and a bottle of Jack
{{champion:77}} If PETA asks this fur is fake
{{champion:119}} i have everything i need: myself.
{{champion:103}} : The souls of the thousands of males I've seduced and killed...

{{champion:222}} Let's see, I have guns, bombs bullets, and lots of Belts... FOR NO REASON AT ALL!!

{{champion:245}} {{champion:26}} We got all the time in the world
Beauty is only skin deep, which is pretty deep for fat urgot

{{champion:23}} Once I get full build, I'll have 100% lifesteal!

{{champion:412}} Really? I haven't built anything yet and I've already got 100% wifesteal.

{{champion:236}} Q_Q
{{champion:39}}: I have the most unbalanced kit :D
Haven't you seen her ride on her totally gnarly blades. Those things are hella balanced bro.
{{champion:4}} {{champion:104}} : My best friend, some booze, and lots of money.
{{champion:254}}  5 reasons for you to shut up
{{champion:35}} Flash always up, stealth, and guaranteed crit.
{{champion:79}} I'm glad I've got my beer... My other casket of beer. Another casket of beer... A secret facility full of beer... The only time I have a drinking problem is when I spill it!!!
